ai.summary: An easy 4.3 km woodland hike in the UK, suitable for families and casual hikers. The High Close Tree Trail offers a gentle route through a stand of tall trees with light elevation changes and relaxing scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained forest paths with some compact gravel, occasional soft ground, and a few muddy patches after rain. Gentle gradients make it comfortable for beginners; watch for roots and uneven surfaces.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, check the forecast before you go, and bring water. Insect repellent and a basic first aid kit are advisable. Be mindful of other hikers and wildlife, and let someone know your plans if hiking alone.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on a phone
